H0.text: Who is said to have cut the Gordian Knot. Alexander the Great

H1.text: Who is said to have cut the Gordian Knot. Hercules

H2.text: Who is said to have cut the Gordian Knot. Perseus

H3.text: Who is said to have cut the Gordian Knot. Sikunder

A4.text: Alexander 'undid' the hitherto unsolvable Gordian Knot, a feat said to await the future 'king of Asia'.
